verses.verse: And <WG2532> again <WG3825> he entered <WG1525> <WG5627> into <WG1519> K'far-Nachum <WG2584> after <WG1223> some days <WG2250>; and <WG2532> it was noised <WG191> <WG5681> that <WG3754> he was <WG2076> <WG5748> in <WG1519> the house <WG3624>.

And <WG2532> straightway <WG2112> many <WG4183> were gathered together <WG4863> <WG5681>, insomuch that <WG5620> there was <WG5562> no <WG3371> room to receive <WG5562> <WG5721> them, no, not so much <WG3366> as about <WG4314> the door <WG2374>: and <WG2532> he preached <WG2980> <WG5707> the word <WG3056> unto them <WG846>.
And <WG2532> they come <WG2064> <WG5736> unto <WG4314> him <WG846>, bringing <WG5342> <WG5723> one sick of the palsy <WG3885>, which was borne <WG142> <WG5746> of <WG5259> four <WG5064>.

And <WG2532> when they could <WG1410> <WG5740> not <WG3361> come nigh <WG4331> <WG5658> unto him <WG846> for <WG1223> the press <WG3793>, they uncovered <WG648> <WG5656> the roof <WG4721> where <WG3699> he was <WG2258> <WG5713>: and <WG2532> when they had broken it up <WG1846> <WG5660>, they let down <WG5465> <WG5719> the bed <WG2895> wherein <WG1909> <WG3739> the sick of the palsy <WG3885> lay <WG2621> <WG5711>.

When <WG1161> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> saw <WG1492> <WG5631> their <WG846> faith <WG4102>, he said <WG3004> <WG5719> unto the sick of the palsy <WG3885>, Son <WG5043>, thy <WG4675> sins <WG266> be forgiven <WG863> <WG5769> thee <WG4671>.

But <WG1161> there were <WG2258> <WG5713> certain <WG5100> of the scribes <WG1122> sitting <WG2521> <WG5740> there <WG1563>, and <WG2532> reasoning <WG1260> <WG5740> in <WG1722> their <WG846> hearts <WG2588>,

Why <WG5101> doth <WG2980> this <WG3778> man thus <WG3779> speak <WG2980> <WG5719> blasphemies <WG988>? who <WG5101> can <WG1410> <WG5736> forgive <WG863> <WG5721> sins <WG266> but <WG1508> 'Elohim <WG2316> only <WG1520>?

And <WG2532> immediately <WG2112> when Yeshuw`a <WG2424> perceived <WG1921> <WG5631> in his <WG846> spirit <WG4151> that <WG3754> they so <WG3779> reasoned <WG1260> <WG5736> within <WG1722> themselves <WG1438>, he said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, Why <WG5101> reason ye <WG1260> <WG5736> these things <WG5023> in <WG1722> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588>?

Whether <WG5101> is it <WG2076> <WG5748> easier <WG2123> to say <WG2036> <WG5629> to the sick of the palsy <WG3885>, Thy sins <WG266> be forgiven <WG863> <WG5769> thee <WG4671>; or <WG2228> to say <WG2036> <WG5629>, Arise <WG1453> <WG5669>, and <WG2532> take up <WG142> <WG5657> thy <WG4675> bed <WG2895>, and <WG2532> walk <WG4043> <WG5720>?

But <WG1161> that <WG2443> ye may know <WG1492> <WG5762> that <WG3754> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> hath <WG2192> <WG5719> power <WG1849> on <WG1909> earth <WG1093> to forgive <WG863> <WG5721> sins <WG266>, (he saith <WG3004> <WG5719> to the sick of the palsy <WG3885>,)

I say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto thee <WG4671>, Arise <WG1453> <WG5669>, and <WG2532> take up <WG142> <WG5657> thy <WG4675> bed <WG2895>, and <WG2532> go thy way <WG5217> <WG5720> into <WG1519> thine <WG4675> house <WG3624>.

And <WG2532> immediately <WG2112> he arose <WG1453> <WG5681>, took up <WG142> <WG5660> the bed <WG2895>, and <WG2532> went forth <WG1831> <WG5627> before <WG1726> them all <WG3956>; insomuch that <WG5620> they were <WG1839> all <WG3956> amazed <WG1839> <WG5733>, and <WG2532> glorified <WG1392> <WG5721> 'Elohim <WG2316>, saying <WG3004> <WG5723>, <WG3754> We <WG1492> never <WG3763> saw <WG1492> <WG5627> it on this fashion <WG3779>.

And <WG2532> he went forth <WG1831> <WG5627> again <WG3825> by <WG3844> the sea side <WG2281>; and <WG2532> all <WG3956> the multitude <WG3793> resorted <WG2064> <WG5711> unto <WG4314> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> he taught <WG1321> <WG5707> them <WG846>.

And <WG2532> as he passed by <WG3855> <WG5723>, he saw <WG1492> <WG5627> Levi <WG3018> the son of Alphaeus <WG256> sitting <WG2521> <WG5740> at <WG1909> the receipt of custom <WG5058>, and <WG2532> said <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, Follow <WG190> <WG5720> me <WG3427>. And <WG2532> he arose <WG450> <WG5631> and followed <WG190> <WG5656> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> it came to pass <WG1096> <WG5633>, that <WG1722>, as Yeshuw`a <WG846> sat at meat <WG2621> <WG5738> in <WG1722> his <WG846> house <WG3614>, many <WG4183> publicans <WG5057> and <WG2532> sinners <WG268> sat <WG4873> also <WG2532> together with <WG4873> <WG5711> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> and <WG2532> his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101>: for <WG1063> there were <WG2258> <WG5713> many <WG4183>, and <WG2532> they followed <WG190> <WG5656> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> when the scribes <WG1122> and <WG2532> P'rushim <WG5330> saw <WG1492> <WG5631> him <WG846> eat <WG2068> <WG5723> with <WG3326> publicans <WG5057> and <WG2532> sinners <WG268>, they said <WG3004> <WG5707> unto his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101>, How <WG5101> is it that <WG3754> he eateth <WG2068> <WG5719> and <WG2532> drinketh <WG4095> <WG5719> with <WG3326> publicans <WG5057> and <WG2532> sinners <WG268>?

When <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> heard <WG191> <WG5660> it, he saith <WG3004> <WG5719> unto them <WG846>, They that are whole <WG2480> <WG5723> have <WG2192> <WG5719> no <WG3756> need <WG5532> of the physician <WG2395>, but <WG235> they that are <WG2192> <WG5723> sick <WG2560>: I came <WG2064> <WG5627> not <WG3756> to call <WG2564> <WG5658> the righteous <WG1342>, but <WG235> sinners <WG268> to <WG1519> repentance <WG3341>.

And <WG2532> the Talmidim <WG3101> of Yochanan <WG2491> and <WG2532> of the P'rushim <WG5330> used <WG2258> <WG5713> to fast <WG3522> <WG5723>: and <WG2532> they come <WG2064> <WG5736> and <WG2532> say <WG3004> <WG5719> unto him <WG846>, Why do <WG1302> <WG3522> the Talmidim <WG3101> of Yochanan <WG2491> and <WG2532> of the P'rushim <WG5330> fast <WG3522> <WG5719>, but <WG1161> thy <WG4674> Talmidim <WG3101> fast <WG3522> <WG5719> not <WG3756>?

And <WG2532> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> said <WG2036> <WG5627> unto them <WG846>, <WG3361> Can <WG1410> <WG5736> the children <WG5207> of the bridechamber <WG3567> fast <WG3522> <WG5721>, while <WG1722> <WG3739> the bridegroom <WG3566> is <WG2076> <WG5748> with <WG3326> them <WG846>? as long as <WG3745> <WG5550> they have <WG2192> <WG5719> the bridegroom <WG3566> with <WG3326> them <WG1438>, they cannot <WG3756> <WG1410> <WG5736> fast <WG3522> <WG5721>.

But <WG1161> the days <WG2250> will come <WG2064> <WG5695>, when <WG3752> the bridegroom <WG3566> shall be taken away <WG522> <WG5686> from <WG575> them <WG846>, and <WG2532> then <WG5119> shall they fast <WG3522> <WG5692> in <WG1722> those <WG1565> days <WG2250>.

No man <WG3762> also <WG2532> seweth <WG1976> <WG5719> a piece <WG1915> of new <WG46> cloth <WG4470> on <WG1909> an old <WG3820> garment <WG2440>: else <WG1490> the new piece <WG2537> that filled it up <WG4138> taketh away <WG142> <WG5719> from <WG846> the old <WG3820>, and <WG2532> the rent <WG4978> is made <WG1096> <WG5736> worse <WG5501>.

And <WG2532> no man <WG3762> putteth <WG906> <WG5719> new <WG3501> wine <WG3631> into <WG1519> old <WG3820> bottles <WG779>: else <WG1490> the new <WG3501> wine <WG3631> doth burst <WG4486> <WG5719> the bottles <WG779>, and <WG2532> the wine <WG3631> is spilled <WG1632> <WG5743>, and <WG2532> the bottles <WG779> will be marred <WG622> <WG5698>: but <WG235> new <WG3501> wine <WG3631> must be put <WG992> into <WG1519> new <WG2537> bottles <WG779>.

And <WG2532> it came to pass <WG1096> <WG5633>, that he <WG846> went <WG3899> <WG5738> through <WG1223> the corn fields <WG4702> on <WG1722> the sabbath day <WG4521>; and <WG2532> his <WG846> Talmidim <WG3101> began <WG756> <WG5662>, as they went <WG3598> <WG4160> <WG5721>, to pluck <WG5089> <WG5723> the ears of corn <WG4719>.

And <WG2532> the P'rushim <WG5330> said <WG3004> <WG5707> unto him <WG846>, Behold <WG2396>, why <WG5101> do they <WG4160> <WG5719> on <WG1722> the sabbath day <WG4521> that which <WG3739> is <WG1832> not <WG3756> Torahful <WG1832> <WG5748>?

And <WG2532> he <WG846> said <WG3004> <WG5707> unto them <WG846>, Have ye never <WG3763> read <WG314> <WG5627> what <WG5101> David <WG1138> did <WG4160> <WG5656>, when <WG3753> he had <WG2192> <WG5627> need <WG5532>, and <WG2532> was an hungred <WG3983> <WG5656>, he <WG846>, and <WG2532> they that were with <WG3326> him <WG846>?

How <WG4459> he went <WG1525> <WG5627> into <WG1519> the house <WG3624> of 'Elohim <WG2316> in the days <WG1909> of Evyatar <WG8> the Kohen HaGodol <WG749>, and <WG2532> did eat <WG5315> <WG5627> the shewbread <WG740> <WG4286>, which <WG3739> is <WG1832> not <WG3756> Torahful <WG1832> <WG5748> to eat <WG5315> <WG5629> but for <WG1508> the Kohanim <WG2409>, and <WG2532> gave <WG1325> <WG5656> also <WG2532> to them which were <WG5607> <WG5752> with <WG4862> him <WG846>?
And <WG2532> he said <WG3004> <WG5707> unto them <WG846>, The sabbath <WG4521> was made <WG1096> <WG5633> for <WG1223> man <WG444>, and not <WG3756> man <WG444> for <WG1223> the sabbath <WG4521>:
Therefore <WG5620> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> is <WG2076> <WG5748> YY <WG2962> also <WG2532> of the sabbath <WG4521>.
